title: Boosthub
description: Platform to offer blockchain courses and  mentoring services related to development
teamText: It was developed in collaboration with an expert in blockchain. I was in charge of the full front-end, almost all  the back-end and all of the infrastructure settings.

longDescription.frontend: This project has been fully developed using React with Javascript. Application is fully responsive.
longDescription.backend: The back-end has been developed using Node.js with Typescript.
longDescription.database: The database used is Postgres. For local development, I used a Postgres docker container. For production, I used a Dokku app to create the database.
longDescription.deployment: The application is deployed in a personal VPS with Ubuntu distribution. I used Dokku as orchestration tool and CloudFare as CDN. The domain is managed by CloudFare.
longDescription.blockchain: The application uses Ethers.js to interact with the Arbitrum blockchain. The application permits minting a  NFT certifacte in the blockchain when a course is finished.

title: Fast ticket
description: Application to share the ticket of a restaurant/bar easily between several people
teamText: It was developed in collaboration with  an expert in data science. I was in charge of the full front-end development, the CORS configuration in the backend and all of the infrastructure settings.

longDescription.frontend: This project has been developed using React with Typescript. Application is designed to be used in a mobile phone.
longDescription.backend: The back-end has been developed using Python, specifically Fast-API. The backed used an API for an enterprise called Mindee which performs an OCR to the restaurant receipts.
longDescription.database: The database used is Postgres. I used a Dokku app to create the database.
longDescription.deployment: The application is deployed in a personal VPS with Ubuntu distribution. I used Dokku as orchestration tool and CloudFare as CDN. The domain is managed by CloudFare.

title: Smart swapper
description: Dapp to swap tokens in Binance Smart Chain through Paraswap aggregator. This permits select the best path for each route getting the best results.
teamText: This project was developed by myself. It is an example of how  to build a simple but useful Dapp. At this moment it is only valid for Binance Smart chain but in the future it wwould  be multichain.

longDescription.frontend: This project has been developed using React with Typescript. To interact to blockchain network it used web3.js and the wallets  connection is based on EIP-6963 which permits detect several browser wallet at the same time. The application is fully responsive.
longDescription.backend: The dapp has not a backend. The front-end interacts directly with Paraswap API to get the best route for the swap and send the generated swap data to the Paraswap smart contract.
longDescription.database: This project does not have a database.
longDescription.deployment: The front-end is deployed in Netlify platform.

title: Food ranking
description: Application to rank food depending on my personal criteria.
teamText: This project was developed by myself. It was one of my first full-stack project.

longDescription.frontend: This project has been developed using React with Typescript. The application is fully responsive.
longDescription.backend: The back-end has been developed using Node.js with Typescript. It is deployed using serverless functions provided by Microsoft Azure.
longDescription.database: The database used is Postgres. I used an external provider to get Postgres database services.
longDescription.deployment: The front-end is deployed in Netlify platform and the back-end in the serverless services provided by Microsoft Azure.
